Hi Dave and All,

  I have been singing the praises of Francis Boyd for alm=
ost twenty years now. I have ever been able to jst plunk down the dash and =
a commission a piece fro him, but if I were to get a custom made shinsakuto=
, I would want one from Francis above any other living swordsmith.  If you =
can spend some time with him, like the author did, you will easily understa=
nd my sentiments.  Thanks for sharing, Go Eli!

Cheers,

Phil

Sent from my=
 iPad
